last_episode_to_air.name: Treasure
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the altered present, Satoru comes face to face with the killer, who has been plotting to put an end to the twisted game he started 15 years ago.

name: Erased
overview: After finding his mom killed, Satoru's time-traveling ability takes him back 18 years for a chance to prevent her death and those of three classmates.

episodes.name: Flashing Before My Eyes
episodes.overview: Struggling manga artist Satoru leads a mundane life, yet has the innate ability to travel back in time to prevent imminent tragedies.

episodes.name: Palm of the Hand
episodes.overview: After Satoru discovers his mother brutally murdered in his apartment, he goes back 18 years in time, before classmate Kayo's kidnapping and murder.

episodes.name: Bruise
episodes.overview: As Satoru relives his childhood days at school, he befriends Kayo and stays by her side on March 1 to thwart the kidnapping that would take her life.

episodes.name: Accomplishment
episodes.overview: Unsure if Kayo is alive, a distraught Satoru is suddenly sent back to the present, where the police search for him as a suspect in his mother's murder.

episodes.name: Getaway
episodes.overview: Satoru meets with Sawada, a former colleague of his mother, who is also looking for a connection between her murder and the kidnappings from the past.

episodes.name: Grim Reaper
episodes.overview: Kayo shows her friends the bag that the angry stranger stashed inside the bus. Inspired by Satoru, his mother and teacher take action to help Kayo.

episodes.name: Out of Control
episodes.overview: Satoru and his classmates struggle to befriend a lone student from another elementary school whom they fear will be the kidnapper's next target.

episodes.name: Spiral
episodes.overview: Satoru pursues the alleged kidnapper with the aid of his teacher. Years later, former classmate Kenya agrees to help Sawada find the true culprit.

episodes.name: Closure
episodes.overview: Satoru awakens, realizing he has no memory of the past nor his ability. With his former classmates' help, he pieces together his forgotten past.

episodes.name: Joy
episodes.overview: Satoru becomes aware he has two different memories of the same timeline. Struggling to make sense of it all, he hopes a visit with Airi will help.

episodes.name: Future
episodes.overview: Together with Kumi, Satoru visits a physical therapy camp hosted by Councilman Nishizono, a new alias of a person from long ago.

episodes.name: Treasure
episodes.overview: In the altered present, Satoru comes face to face with the killer, who has been plotting to put an end to the twisted game he started 15 years ago.
